commented_code:
+metadata:
+  version: 0.2
+  approach: define failing
+  id: CKV_AWS_59
+  name: Ensure there is no open access to back-end resources through API
+  category: GENERAL_SECURITY
+scope:
+  languages:
+    - python
+definition:
+  pattern: aws_cdk.aws_apigateway.Method(<ANY>, http_method=$ARG, <ANY>, authorization_type=aws_cdk.aws_apigateway.AuthorizationType.NONE, <ANY>, api_key_required=False)

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -0,0 +1,14 @@
+metadata:
+  version: 0.2
+  approach: define failing
+  id: CKV_AWS_59
+  name: Ensure there is no open access to back-end resources through API
+  category: GENERAL_SECURITY
+scope:
+  languages:
+    - python
+definition:
+  pattern: aws_cdk.aws_apigateway.Method(<ANY>, http_method=$ARG, <ANY>, authorization_type=aws_cdk.aws_apigateway.AuthorizationType.NONE, <ANY>, api_key_required=False)
discussion_comments.comment_body:
Keyword arguments can be supplied everywhere in the function call..
You need to create SIX patterns (with or between them).
1 - http_method, authorization_type, api_key_required
2 - http_method, api_key_required, authorization_type
3 - api_key_required, http_method, authorization_type
4 - api_key_required, authorization_type, http_method
5 - authorization_type, api_key_required, http_method
6 - authorization_type, http_method,  api_key_required
 
Send it to @tsmithv11

commented_code:
type: string

-              - message
\ No newline at end of file

+security:
